alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 28 at 10:45PM MST until March 01 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains and Cody Foothills. * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. Localized gusts of 75 to 90 mph in the Absaroka Mountains. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains and Cody Foothills. The strongest winds will be west and north of the city of Cody. * WHEN...Until 8 AM Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk, especially for light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Also high winds could do some light roof damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A spotter near Wapiti reported a peak wind gust of 91 mph around 9 PM.
info.instruction: In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle. Use caution if you must drive.
